description:
A pair of spirits take advantage of a beautiful spring day and put the entire class to sleep, but Ataru, Mendou, and Lum manage to stay awake! The gang goes to recite poetry under the peach blossoms, but a few larger-than-life characters come to join them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haru Urara Inemuri Kyoushitsu / Momo no Hana Utagassen
La classe endormie d`une journée d`été / Fleur de pécher
Problemi di primavera - Fiore di pesco
Sleeping in Class on a Wonderful Spring Day / Peach Blossom Poetry Contest
春うらら 居眠り教室 - 桃の花 歌合戦
